86059.summary: Some customers in the West End area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
86059.title: Jan 13 - Vancouver (West End) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)

86085.summary: Some customers in the Glendale area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
86085.title: Jan 14 - Calgary (Glendale) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
